helpComponent.title: We have compiled the most important information to help you make the most of this experience. Can't find what you need? Please contact us.
helpComponent.paragraph: If you want to send us an email, please send an email to xxxxxx@xx.com. We will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible.

faqPage.item1Title: How do I upload a menu image and let AI generate a menu?
faqPage.item1Content:
To upload a menu image and have AI generate a menu, please follow these steps:
1. Navigate to the sidebar, click the "+" sign on the right side of the "Menu" category to create a new menu
2. Enter the new menu, upload the image, and start parsing
3. AI will automatically recognize the text and generate a draft
4. Be sure to proofread: You can check and modify the recognized content, change the menu name, etc. in the editing interface, click "Save"
faqPage.item2Title: Limitations for uploading menu images (supported formats? Size limits?)
faqPage.item2Content: Support JPG, PNG, WebP formats, up to 10MB
faqPage.item3Title: What to do if the recognition is wrong?
faqPage.item3Content:
We recommend:
1. Click the wrong text directly in the editing interface to modify the content
2. If the recognition fails in a large area â†’ re-upload a clearer photo
Note: Handwriting, artistic fonts, and low-contrast images may affect the recognition effect
faqPage.item4Title: How to improve AI recognition rate?
faqPage.item4Content:
We recommend ensuring that the menu image:
1. Sufficient and even lighting
2. Flat and wrinkle-free
3. The text is clear and facing, avoiding reflection blur
faqPage.item5Title: How to view and download the menu QR code?
faqPage.item5Content:
To view and download menu QR codes, please follow these steps:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and click to select the corresponding menu
2. Click "QR Code" in the upper right corner of the page
3. Preview or download the QR code
faqPage.item6Title: What should I do if the customer cannot or does not want to scan the QR code?
faqPage.item6Content:
We recommend:
1. Prepare several paper menus as backup
2. You can place QR code instruction cards on the table to help guests scan the code
3. The waiter can proactively ask if they need help
4. Consider placing tablets in the store for guests to order directly
faqPage.item7Title: How do I arrange my menu categories?
faqPage.item7Content:
It is recommended to organize it in the following way:
1. Put popular dishes first
2. Arrange in the order of eating (such as appetizers, main courses, desserts)
3. Special dishes can be classified separately
4. Drinks and alcoholic beverages are classified separately
5. You can use the drag and drop function to adjust the order of categories
faqPage.item8Title: How do I change my currency?
faqPage.item8Content:
To set the currency of the menu, please follow the steps below:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and click to select the corresponding menu
2. In front of the dish price, there is a "currency abbreviation" mark. Click the down arrow to enter the drop-down menu of available currencies
faqPage.item9Title: How to edit the generated menu?
faqPage.item9Content:
To edit the generated menu, please follow the steps below:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and click to select the corresponding menu
2. Delete or modify the dish name, price, picture, etc. directly in the editing interface
3. Click "Save" to successfully modify
faqPage.item10Content:
To delete the menu, please follow the steps below:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and click to select the corresponding menu
2. Click the "Edit" icon next to the menu name in the upper left corner
3. Click the "Delete" icon in the pop-up box
faqPage.item11Title: How to share the electronic menu with others?
faqPage.item11Content:
If you want to share and view the menu, please follow the steps below:
1. Download the QR code corresponding to the generated menu
2. Provide the electronic QR code or print the QR code for others to scan and view
3. Use your mobile phone to scan the QR code to view the electronic menu
faqPage.item12Title: How to view the access data of the menu?
faqPage.item12Content:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and enter the [Dashboard] panel
2. View core indicators

helpSettingPage.item1Title: What is the difference between a guest account and a formal account?
helpSettingPage.item1Content: The guest account is limited to 3 stores and a total of 50 menus. The formal account is unlimited
helpSettingPage.item2Title: Will my menu be lost after the guest account is upgraded to a formal account?
helpSettingPage.item2Content: No, after upgrading to a formal account, TTPOS-MENU will keep the stores and menus created when the guest account was created for you
helpSettingPage.item3Content:
To modify password, email, name, please follow the steps below:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and click "Settings"
2. Click "Account Security"
3. Click "Update Account" after modifying the information
helpSettingPage.item4Content:
To add a store, please follow the steps below:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and click the store name at the top
2. Click "Add store" in the pop-up box
3. Fill in the corresponding information and click "OK"
helpSettingPage.item5Content:
To view the data of different stores, please follow the steps below:
1. Navigate to the sidebar and click the store name at the top
2. In the pop-up box, you can choose to switch between different stores under the current user
3. After selecting the corresponding store, you can manage the menu of the store, etc.

whyUs.title: Why Choose TTPOS Menu?
whyUs.subtitle: We use cutting-edge technology to provide the smartest and most convenient digital menu solutions for the food service industry
whyUs.feature1Description: Advanced image recognition technology based on GPT-4 accurately identifies dish names, prices, and descriptions, with up to 95% accuracy
whyUs.feature2Description: No registration required, use instantly. The system automatically creates a guest account, and you can upgrade to a full account with one click, with seamless data migration
whyUs.feature3Description: Responsive design perfectly adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop devices. The generated digital menu supports QR code sharing, and customers can view it by scanning

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. We understand the importance of personal information to you and will do our utmost to protect the security and reliability of your personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content:
1.1 Information you provide: When you register an account, use our services, or contact us, we may collect personal information you provide, such as name, contact details, account information, etc.
1.2 Information generated during your use of services: Including your operation records, browsing records, transaction records, etc.
1.3 Device information: We may collect information about the device you use, such as device model, operating system version, device settings, IP address, etc.
1.4 Log information: When you use our services, the system may automatically collect information about your use of the service, such as access dates and times, software crash situations, etc.

section2.title: 2. Information Use
section2.content:
2.1 To provide, maintain, and improve our services.
2.2 To send you notifications, activity information, etc.
2.3 To design new products or services.
2.4 To conduct data analysis.
2.5 To fulfill obligations according to legal requirements.

section3.title: 3. Information Protection
section3.content:
3.1 We use various security technologies and procedures to prevent loss, improper use, unauthorized viewing, or disclosure of information.
3.2 We take reasonable and feasible measures to ensure that irrelevant personal information is not collected.
3.3 We use various security protection measures within a reasonable security level to ensure the security of information.
3.4 The internet is not an absolutely secure environment, and we strongly recommend that you do not send any sensitive personal information via public networks.

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section5.content:
5.1 We may use cookies and similar technologies to collect and use your information.
5.2 You can refuse or manage cookies through browser settings. However, please note that if cookies are disabled, you may not be able to enjoy the best service experience, and some services may not function properly.

section6.title: 6. Protection of Minors
section6.content:
6.1 We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors. If you are a minor under the age of 18, you should obtain prior written consent from your parents or legal guardians before using our services.
6.2 For personal information of minors collected with the consent of parents or legal guardians, we will only use or disclose this information in situations where the law permits, parents or guardians explicitly consent, or it is necessary to protect minors.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.content:
7.1 You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information.
7.2 You have the right to withdraw consent previously given for processing personal information.
7.3 You have the right to obtain a copy of your personal information.
7.4 In specific circumstances, you have the right to restrict or object to our processing of your personal information.

section8.title: 8. Updates to Privacy Policy
section8.content:
8.1 We may revise the terms of this Privacy Policy from time to time.
8.2 For significant changes, we will provide prominent notice.
8.3 If you continue to use our services, it means you agree to be bound by the revised Privacy Policy.

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.content: If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions regarding this Privacy Policy, or if you believe our personal information processing practices may have harmed your legitimate rights, please contact us through the following channels:

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.introduction: Welcome to our service! Please read the following terms carefully before using our service. By using this service, you agree to be bound by this agreement.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance and Modification of Agreement
section1.content:
1.1 This agreement is established between you and our platform regarding the use of our services.
1.2 We reserve the right to modify these terms when necessary. You can review the latest version of the terms on the relevant pages.
1.3 If you continue to use our services after the terms have been modified, it is deemed that you have accepted the modified agreement.

section2.title: 2. Account Registration and Security
section2.content:
2.1 Upon successful registration, you will receive an account and corresponding password, which you are responsible for safeguarding.
2.2 You are responsible for all activities and events under your account.
2.3 If you discover any unauthorized use of your account, please notify us immediately.

section3.title: 3. User Conduct Standards

section4.title: 4. Content Standards
section4.content:
4.1 The content you upload should comply with laws, regulations, public order and good morals, and the provisions of this agreement.
4.2 We have the right to delete content that violates the above regulations and reserve the right to pursue relevant responsibilities.
4.3 For the content you upload, you should ensure that you have the corresponding legal rights.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content:
5.1 All content on this platform, including but not limited to text, images, audio, video, software, programs, page designs, etc., are protected by intellectual property laws and regulations.
5.2 Without our or the relevant rights holder's written permission, you may not copy, modify, compile, publish, or distribute the above content in any way.

section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
section6.content:
6.1 We strive to ensure the security and stability of our services, but cannot completely rule out service interruptions or other issues caused by network, device failures, system maintenance, etc.
6.2 We are not responsible for service interruptions or other defects caused by force majeure or reasons beyond our control.
6.3 You understand and agree that we do not make any express or implied warranties regarding the legality, authenticity, or validity of communications, transactions, or other behaviors between users through the platform.

section7.title: 7. Agreement Termination
section7.content:
7.1 If you violate the provisions of this agreement, we have the right to take measures such as warning, restricting, or terminating the provision of services as appropriate.
7.2 You have the right to cancel your account, after which the service agreement between you and us will terminate.
7.3 After the agreement is terminated, we have the right to continue to retain your relevant information as required by laws and regulations.

section8.title: 8. Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
section8.content:
8.1 This agreement is governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China.
8.2 Any disputes arising from or related to this agreement shall be resolved through friendly negotiation; if negotiation fails, either party has the right to submit the dispute to the people's court with jurisdiction.
